ANNOUNCEMENTS.TITLE: Your notifications
ANNOUNCEMENTS.SCHEDULE_DATE:
Class schedule change - {{name}}
Class from day {{oldDate}} has changed to the day {{newDate}}.
ANNOUNCEMENTS.SCHEDULE_ROOM:
Classroom change - {{name}}
Class from day {{date}} has moved to classroom {{room}}.
ANNOUNCEMENTS.SCHEDULE_CANCELLATION: Class {{name}} of the day {{day}} from {{from}} to {{to}} has been cancelled.
ANNOUNCEMENTS.GRADE_FINAL: The mark for the activity {{activity}} of the subject {{subject}} has been published.

ERRORS.INTERNET: It seems to be a problem with your internet connection.

ERRORS.NO_RESULTS: Sorry, we could not find what you were looking for
ERRORS.SERVER: There seems to be a problem with the service

ERRORS.NOT_SUBJECT: We are sorry. We have not found grades for this subject.
ERRORS.PERMISSION_DENIED: We are sorry. We need your permission to access the university’s corporate services

ERRORS.USER_NOT_FOUND: User not found / Invalid or expired token
